sections.heading: ditches; petition; survey; cost estimate
sections.text: Upon the filing of the petition provided for in section 31-135, it shall be the duty of the county board to cause a survey and estimate of the cost of such improvement to be made by some competent surveyor within sixty days thereafter.SourceLaws 1911, c. 141,

31-136.Drainage ditches; petition; survey; cost estimate.

Upon the filing of the petition provided for in section 31-135, it shall be the duty of the county board to cause a survey and estimate of the cost of such improvement to be made by some competent surveyor within sixty days thereafter.

SourceLaws 1911, c. 141, § 2, p. 465;R.S.1913, § 1753;C.S.1922, § 1700;C.S.1929, § 31-136;R.S.1943, § 31-136.
